title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2C.102 - Pass Left Or Right Sign (NYW3-4)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2C.102 - Pass Left Or Right Sign (NYW3-4)

State Regulations

Option: 01 The Pass Left or Right (NYW3-4) sign (see Sign Drawing
SD-W3) may be used in advance of the Double Arrow (W12-1) sign (see Section
2C.25) to warn of loading and refuge islands, traffic islands with curbs, and
other obstructions in the roadway where traffic may pass on either
side. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
2C.102

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
